nodes.bodyText: This is wasteful because it will actually download the artifact
Totally agreed. My understanding is that getting enabling a HEAD would require a cloud change, which we missed the boat on for beta2
Michael, are you confident about that? I briefly looked the source code. It does open the input stream but I'm not sure if it reads the whole stream.
It will open the stream which will definitely start the download. Not sure if it would be interrupted after the first packet with headers.
